ygData.msgSnippet: HM, well, apparently the download ended up only about 30 minutes long (i really hate those) and, i am currently outdated on all the EQ lingo, so if anyone
ygData.messageBody:
HM, well, apparently the download ended up only about 30 minutes long
(i really hate those) and, i am currently outdated on all the EQ
lingo, so if anyone could fill me in...


--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., xela_orcbane <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> Were you still downloading even though you were "idle" for 5 mos??
> Seems like you missed all the big patches from Luclin. They were a
> large load to handle even if you were patching regularly-- if you
> have 5 months of patching to do... yeah, i can see 25hours on a
> really slow line.
